message.body: Hello lovely friend! I am so thrilled to see you! I hear I have the honor of delivering the bride to her party :) can you send me your address? Muah!
Not at all! What time is best to be there?
Umm I would say if you can get to my apartment by 12:15 that should give us plenty of time to pick them up and get to Mrs Ks by 12:30...then again, maybe 12:10 just to be safe haha
Perfecto! I will see you so soon you little bride you!

Oh and also, I'm not sure what your phone is going to tell you, but I would avoid georgia ave until you're in md (in dc it's all lights)... the best way might be to come up through the park to 16th and then kalmia/alaska to get up to georgia
Sorry if that didn't make any sense haha
Ahh good to know! It took us Georgia ave last time so I will try to avoid that!! Woohoo
